channel.title: Dragon Claws
channel.description: I finally got my Dragon Claw spec working after I R Pwn U helped me with it. Now how can I make it so I can't wear a shield with them.. Any help is appreciated.

item.title: Dragon Claws
item.dc:creator: @willie2579 willie2579
item.description:
@willie2579 wrote:

I don’t know if this will work either but do in client.java

Search for 2h and where it says the id’s replace an id with urs.
Or when your owner you can wield shield with anything 2handed.

Read full topic

and search for

don’t think it will work do.
